basics.name: Quang Pham
basics.summary: I am an undergraduate Mechanical Engineering student at the University of Florida. I am excited about robotics, including motion planning, reinforcement learning, and active perception. I have pursued research under the Active Perception and Robot Intelligence Lab, as well as the Smart Autonomy Lab, and I am always trying to learn more.
